Class CircleIntensityProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
              • models.CircleIntensityProfile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CircleIntensityProfile
extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
    The CircleIntensityProfile class creates a JavaFX node that contains a plot of the central-line intensity profile

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircleIntensityProfile

        public CircleIntensityProfile(double diameter,
                              double wavelength)
        constructor for the CircleIntensityProfile that establishes sets up the axes and plot features in addition to plotting initial parameters.
        Parameters:
        diameter - diameter of aperture in millimeters
        wavelength - wavelength of aperture in millimeters

    • Method Detail

      • computeRelativeIntensity

        private double computeRelativeIntensity(double angle)
        computeRelativeIntensity
        Parameters:
        angle - diffraction angle in radians
        Returns:
        double representing relative light intensity at the given angle

      • plotIntensity

        private void plotIntensity()
        plotIntensity updates the chart with the proper central-line intensity profile using the set mmDiameter and mmWavelength fields. It also updates the plot line color to correspond with the wavelength in visible light

      • computeXMax

        private double computeXMax(double diameter,
                           double wavelength)
        computes an appropriate maximum angle value for an intensity plot series based on diameter and wavelength, to ensure a nicely scaled graph
        Parameters:
        diameter - diameter of aperture in millimeters
        wavelength - wavelength of light in millimeters
        Returns:
        double double

      • computeXMin

        private double computeXMin(double diameter,
                           double wavelength)
        computes an appropriate minimum angle value for an intensity plot series based on diameter and wavelength, to ensure a nicely scaled graph
        Parameters:
        diameter - diameter of aperture in millimeters
        wavelength - wavelength of light in millimeters
        Returns:
        double double

      • computeStep

        private double computeStep(double diameter,
                           double wavelength)
        computes an appropriate angle step value for an intensity plot series based on diameter and wavelength, to ensure a nicely scaled graph
        Parameters:
        diameter - diameter of aperture in millimeters
        wavelength - wavelength of light in millimeters
        Returns:
        double double

      • setMmDiameter

        public void setMmDiameter(double diameter)
        setter for the aperture diameter parameter that then updates the intensity plot
        Parameters:
        diameter - new diameter of aperture in millimeters

      • setMmWavelength

        public void setMmWavelength(double wavelength)
        setter for the laser wavelength that then updates the intensity plot
        Parameters:
        wavelength - new wavelength of light in millimeters

      • getMmWavelength

        public double getMmWavelength()
        getter for wavelength
        Returns:
        wavelength in millimeters
